usage_instructions.purpose: This sitemap is used by the FAQ Agent to provide direct links to relevant ERNI Gruppe web pages when answering customer questions.
how_to_use: 1. Search for relevant pages by matching customer question keywords with page tags
2. Use category field to filter pages by type (main, company, services, information)
3. Provide the URL in the response along with a brief description
4. Use bilingual titles and descriptions to support both German and English customers

example_queries.services: For questions about services, search tags for 'planung', 'holzbau', 'spenglerei', 'ausbau', 'realisation', 'agrar'
example_queries.contact: For contact questions, use pages with tags 'kontakt', 'contact', 'adresse', 'telefon'
example_queries.certifications: For certification questions, use pages with tags 'minergie', 'holzbau plus', 'zertifizierungen'
example_queries.team: For team questions, use pages with tags 'team', 'mitarbeiter', 'geschäftsleitung'
example_queries.materials: For material questions, use pages with tags 'holz', 'wood', 'timber', 'baustoff'
